name: set free_topic
func: flow.set('free.topic',msg.payload)

name: set free_msg
func: flow.set('free.msg',msg.payload)

name: get free
set free_dest
func: flow.set('free.dest',msg.payload)

name: interaction topic cmd
init config flow/globals
interaction_msg.remote_name
send
send
send
show_send_msg
func: global.set('ui_config.show_send_msg',msg.payload);

name: send
send
interaction_msg.plc_set
conv
func:
msg.payload = msg.topic + ' -> ' + msg.payload;
return msg;

name: send
send ibs

func: flow.set('mqtt_ibs_topic', msg.payload);
flow.set('mqtt_ibs_msg', msg.payload);
flow.set('mqtt_ibs_esp_name', msg.payload);

name: log plc cmd
func:
msg.topic =  
"INSERT INTO node_log(topic, message) VALUES ( \"node_red/iot_cmd/" + 
msg.topic + "\", \""+ msg.payload + "\" )"

return msg

name: init plc config flow/globals
actuator_cmd.remote_name
actuator_cmd.actuator_type
actuator_cmd.cmd_section
send
actuator_cmd.name
func: flow.set('actuator_cmd.name', msg.payload);

name: visualize
func:
msg.payload = msg.topic + '; ' + msg.payload;

return msg;

name: reboot
label: Reboot
payload: By pressing OK the device will be rebooted.

name: shutdown
label: shutdown
payload: By pressing OK the device will be shutdown.
